SslHero.title: Fast and secure website with Sectigo SSL
SslHero.description: Upgrade your website with an SSL/TLS certificate from Sectigo and enhance your site's security – and gain increased trust from your visitors in the process!

brand_trust.title: Enhanced Brand Trust and Credibility
brand_trust.description: Sectigo is one of the most recognized names in web security. Displaying a Sectigo trust seal and the browser padlock icon immediately signals to your visitors that your business is legitimate and their data is handled by a global leader in encryption.

encryption.title: Advanced Data Encryption and Integrity
encryption.description: Sectigo SSL/TLS certificates provide high-level 256-bit encryption, protecting sensitive information like login credentials, personal data, and credit card numbers. This ensures that data remains private and cannot be intercepted or altered during transit.

seo.title: Improved SEO Rankings
seo.description: Search engines like Google prioritize secure websites (HTTPS) in their search results. By using a Sectigo certificate, you not only secure your site but also improve your visibility, making it easier for potential clients to find your services.

SslInstallation.title: Install SSL with krakenhosting.io in 3 simple steps

order.title: 1. Order
order.description: We will issue your SSL certificate as soon as you have paid for your order.

install.title: 2. Install
install.description: We automatically install the certificate for you if you have web hosting with us. If you are using a different web host instead, you will need to copy the certificate information in your control panel.

redirect.title: 3. Redirect
redirect.description: You can easily redirect your website to your new HTTPS address in your control panel. Done!
